title: Loma Linda, Texas
text:
Loma Linda is a <a href="census-designated%20place">census-designated place</a> (CDP) in <a href="San%20Patricio%20County%2C%20Texas">San Patricio County</a>, <a href="Texas">Texas</a>, United States. The population was 122 at the 2010 census. Prior to the 2010 census Loma Linda was part of the <a href="Del%20Sol-Loma%20Linda%2C%20Texas">Del Sol-Loma Linda</a> CDP.
Geography.
Loma Linda is located at (28.007011, -97.499402).
